entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
